tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Annamma Thomas, she is like an angel who saved me and my son. I was diagnosed with para ovarian cyst torsion during pregnancy. 
One of my cousins suggested here and I underwent cystectomy and laporotamy during 7 th month of my pregnancy. Luckily baby and I were safe. 
And I delivered a healthy baby boy at 37 weeks.
Annama Thomas, is such a friendly and cheerful doctor, she made me feel so good and I recovered fast.
I would like to suggest her to all pregnant women. 
I am very grateful to her üôèüòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Absolute an awful experience. Spent the entire pregnancy under her but thankfully not delivery. *** ****** ******* **** *** ***** ********* *** ************ **** *** **. She **** ******* ********* ******* shouts at patients (and even junior doctors/nurses while you are admitted under her, which makes the situation very uncomfortable and next in the line is your turn to get shouted at). She deals with cash only and gets very angry if asked for a bill. Being a Govt officer, only I know how I resisted myself from reporting her strictly cash transactions without bill. *** **** ****** *** *** *** ******* ** ***** ***** ******* *** ******* **** ********** *** ****** **************** ******** *** *** *** *** ******* **** **** ********** ***** ****** *** *** **** *** ** ** *****. Please go and sit outside Fundus clinic one evening and see the situation yourself. *** **** **** **** *** **** **** **** ** **** ****** **** **** ** ***** **** ******* *** ******* ** ****** *** *********. She even tried to lecture me ** *** ********* ***** and tried to even scold my mother *** *** ********** ********* ***** ** **. Overall it was horrendous. Somehow I was too reluctant to change the doctor during my pregnancy but eventually, I did at the last moment. **** ** **** *** **** **** ***** ** ********* *******. ****** *** **** ********* ****** *** **** ** ******* ** *** ******* **** ** ******** **** ******* **** ****** ***** **** **** ***** **** ********* *** ******* ** ************* ******* there is NO reason to not go to doctors *** **** *** ***** *********.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Initially I was under the assumption that the doctor is very senior, so she would treat me really well. But she proved it wrong by her disrespectful behavior, not allowing husband to enter with the patient, disrespecting my mother *** *** ********** ** ****** ********** ** ****** ******* *******. ** ****** *** **** **** ********** **** ***.I gave her respect only because of the "Dr." prefix in her name. But she is impatient to hear our problems or queries, ******** **** ** **** *** * **** ******* although we pay n wait for hours to meet her. she wants to finish consultation in 5 mins.* *** ************  *** ** ** *** ** *** **** *** *** ******* ******** ********* ** ******** ********* ** ** ******** *** **** ***** ** ********** *********** ** ****** *** ***** ******* ******** *** *** **** ***** **** **** ******** ***** *** **** ** ***** *** *** **** ** ******** *** **** *** ************** *******

tags: Wait time,
review: ******* ****** ** *** **** ***** **** **** ******** I consulted her for my pregnancy. She kept the medicines minimal and suggested me to eat healthy food instead. She made me feel positive throughout my pregnancy journey. Mine was a normal delivery and baby was healthy, though I had complications at third Trimester. My son is now 2 years old and I still feel so grateful to my doctor. Very happy to write a review about her. She is strict at times but all for the good of her patients.. And highly ethical to her profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am not a person who writes reviews. However I had no choice but to find the time and make an effort  to publicly acclaim the Angel in  SAINT Dr Annamma.  I had to wait an hour to see her. But I had no choice for there were other patients who had tokens before me, and come from various parts of the country.  Others waited as well. However every patient who came out of her chamber after the consultation, seemed to be radiating with satisfaction, joy and blessed. No one thought their wait was in vain.  While waiting I spoke to others who were waiting and asked  them why they were coming here inspite of the wait. The unanimous answer was that this doctor is more sympathetic and understanding than any other person or doctor. Several patients had come for second opinion including myself. Dr Annamma was very upfront and clearly indicated that her choice of delivery will always be a normal delivery. After my consultations I never minded the wait as I had found an Angel, whose tender loving hands mixed with love and sympathy, I had never seen  or experienced before.  For me, my family and friends there cannot be another doctor for Obstetrics and Gynaecology.  Thank You Maam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We have been visiting Dr.Annama Thomas for the last 4-5 months. she has been guiding us, providing the right medicines, and avoiding typical pitfalls, as this is our first. she is very approachable, patient and answers all queries, until you are satisfied. The experience shows, and her approach is very different. ** ** ******** *** **** ************* ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Hi I am roopa Navaneeth good and well experienced doctor, I had visited for my 1st pregnancy, I remember at my delivery time I was demanding for c section but the she came and spoke me and put her had on my head and said I am there, I got tears in my eyes, she successfully did normal delivery, now my son is 3 year old and I am going to visit her for my 2nd baby. all I say Dr.Annamma thomas is great.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: We consulted her last week, she just wasted one full day just to tell us to do a scanning, she is least bothered about the patients and very rude, we visited the hospital at 11 am and waited till 6pm at the hospital and we calmly requested her to see the scanning report as we were getting late to our office but she was very arrogant and asked us to wait again to see the report. She was busy in attending the special consultants *** **** **** *** she don't even care about the people who are waiting outside. *** ** *** ****** ****** * **** **** **** ** ** ***** ****** **** **** **** *** ** *** **** **** ** ******* ******** ** *** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Annamma Thomas, a name, that changed our life at a moment when everywhere we got despair and lost hope. Right from the time we met her till the time we got pregnant  every second she lifted us up emotionally and mentally. Usually the doctors write medicines at  every meet during any treatment but she supported me both mentally and at physical level with good normal medications. With normal medications she told me that I will get pregnant at that time when my inner-self was totally in dilemma regarding my pregnancy. She was very polite and calm during our every meeting to her. She listened very carefully our every concern regarding pregnancy. We wish that every Gynecologist should learn from her that how to deal with the person who comes in hope of good treatment. Now we have two year old baby and its all because we got Dr Annamma Thomas as doctor. Best of luck to her...

review: Wouldn't recommend her. *** ** ***** **** ** *** ********. I had a missed abortion and tried to contact her all day. She never responded. We were helpless in her hospital without proper guidance. My D&C happened 12 hours after I got admitted. After the whole ordeal when we met her in a few days, she said things happen in a big hospital

review: Dr Annamma explained every stage of my pregnancy in a very simple manner and answered all my doubts. I developed an instant trust with her because of her friendly and simple nature.I truly feel blessed that I was guided to her by a friend of mine and am thankful to her for bringing my little bundle of joy to this world.

It,s rear to find a doctor that combines such personal touchs and care for a patients as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient.......
